function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in biodiversity may lead to proliferation of pest and harmful organisms in urban environments.","Impact":"Spread of harmful organisms can increase the risk of contagious diseases and public health concerns.","Mitigation":"Implement monitoring and control measures to prevent the proliferation of harmful organisms.","Technologies":"Biological controls, pest management systems, and surveillance technologies.","People":"Inhabitants of urban environments, public health officials, and government bodies.","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, and environmental agencies."},{"Description":"Disease-protective effects of biodiversity may not effectively reduce the transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Ineffective disease protection measures may result in a higher risk of contagious diseases in urban environments.","Mitigation":"Evaluate and adapt biodiversity strategies to ensure effective disease protection.","Technologies":"Ecological modeling, disease surveillance, and adaptive management strategies.","People":"Public health officials, biodiversity researchers, and urban planners.","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies, and biodiversity research institutions."}]}
